Sentencas: CeO2-based materials have been studied intensively as anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this work, pristine and europium (Eu)-doped CeO2 nanowires were comprehensively investigated as anode materials for IT-SOFCs, by a combination of theoretical predictions and experimental characterizations.
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrate: (1) Oxygen vacancies can be energetically favorably introduced into the CeO2 lattice by Eu doping; (2) The lattice parameter of the ceria increases linearly with the Eu content when it varies from 0 to 35 mol.%, simultaneously resulting in a significant increase in oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The concentration of oxygen vacancies reaches its maximum at a ca.
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: 10 mol.% Eu doping level and decreases thereafter; (3) The highest oxygen ion conductivity is achieved at a Eu content of 15 mol.%; while the 10 mol.% Eu-doped CeO2 sample displays the highest catalytic activity for H-2-TPR and CO oxidization reactions.
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The conducting and catalytic properties benefit from the expanded lattice, the large amount of oxygen vacancies, the enhanced reactivity of surface oxygen and the promoted mobility of bulk oxygen ions.
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: These results provide an avenue toward designing and optimizing CeO2 as a promising anode for SOFCs.
Titulo: Europium-Doped Ceria Nanowires as Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
